Popup.Lockoutofreach: This lock is out of reach

useGMquickKeys.name: Use GM quick controls
useGMquickKeys.descrp: Allows the GM to use the special lock related controls listed at the bottom (affected marked with *)

allowLocking.name: Allow player locking
allowLocking.descrp: Allow players to lock locks if they have a matching key

startasLocked.name: Start as locked
startasLocked.descrp: If newly registered locks start locked

LockDistance.name: Lock distance
LockDistance.descrp: Distance over which a lock can be used (in in-game units)

UseArmReachDistance.name: Use "Arms Reach" distance
UseArmReachDistance.descrp: Uses the distance set in the "Arms Reach" for the lock distance

alwaysopenOwned.name: Always open owned
alwaysopenOwned.descrp: Players can always open owned tokens, even if they are locked

MessagePopUps.name: Message popups
MessagePopUps.descrp: Enables multible popups upon actions such locking or unlocking a lock

GMControls.line1: -alt+right-click to create a new key for the lock
GMControls.line3: -ctrl+right-click to copy the locks key IDs (*)
GMControls.line4: -ctrl+left-click to paste key IDs into the lock (*)
